attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Prime Minister Gordon Brown, my name is Farhan Ali I am 10 years old, I am writing this petition to ask you to try and stop the attack by Israel in Gaza and for the UK Government to provide aid to the children and innocent people being harmed.
This is an unfair and unjust war and you must do more to stop this. Please ACT NOW children are dying!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
